headline.print_headline: Honda Scores 2 Goals, Japan Rallies Past Zambia
headline.main: Honda Scores 2 Goals, Japan Rallies Past Zambia

docs.snippet: Keisuke Honda had two goals and Yoshito Okubo scored in the 91st minute, giving Japan a 4-3 victory over Zambia in its final warm-up for the World Cup on Friday night....
docs.lead_paragraph: Keisuke Honda had two goals and Yoshito Okubo scored in the 91st minute, giving Japan a 4-3 victory over Zambia in its final warm-up for the World Cup on Friday night.

headline.sub: Obama returns to U.S. after marking D-Day in Normandy
headline.main: Obama returns to U.S. after marking D-Day in Normandy

docs.snippet: U.S. President Barack Obama returns to U.S. after marking 70th anniversary of the D-Day landings in Normandy. Rough Cut (no reporter narration)....
docs.lead_paragraph: U.S. President Barack Obama returns to U.S. after marking 70th anniversary of the D-Day landings in Normandy. Rough Cut (no reporter narration).

headline.print_headline: AmeriCorps to Provide Legal Aid to Immigrant Kids
headline.main: AmeriCorps to Provide Legal Aid to Immigrant Kids

docs.snippet: Young lawyers and paralegals are being sought for the community service program AmeriCorps to provide legal assistance in immigration proceedings to children who come to the U.S. illegally....
docs.lead_paragraph: Young lawyers and paralegals are being sought for the community service program AmeriCorps to provide legal assistance in immigration proceedings to children who come to the U.S. illegally.

docs.snippet: Kenny Perry and Russ Cochran teamed to birdie the final three holes for a share of the lead with Jeff Sluman and Fred Funk on Friday in the Champions Tour's Legends of Golf....
docs.lead_paragraph: Kenny Perry and Russ Cochran teamed to birdie the final three holes for a share of the lead with Jeff Sluman and Fred Funk on Friday in the Champions Tour's Legends of Golf.

docs.snippet: Veteran of the D-Day landing recalls the terror of the invasion, as others see it as call for freedom as the 70th anniversary is marked in the U.S. Deborah Lutterbeck reports....
docs.lead_paragraph: Veteran of the D-Day landing recalls the terror of the invasion, as others see it as call for freedom as the 70th anniversary is marked in the U.S. Deborah Lutterbeck reports.

headline.print_headline: Hershey Sues Colorado Edible Pot Company
headline.main: Hershey Sues Colorado Edible Pot Company

docs.snippet: The Hershey Co. has sued a Colorado marijuana edibles maker, claiming it makes four pot-infused candies that too closely resemble iconic products of the chocolate maker....
docs.lead_paragraph: The Hershey Co. has sued a Colorado marijuana edibles maker, claiming it makes four pot-infused candies that too closely resemble iconic products of the chocolate maker.

headline.print_headline: California Supreme Court Backs Red-Light Traffic Cameras
headline.main: California Supreme Court Backs Red-Light Traffic Cameras

docs.snippet: The California Supreme Court has ruled that images captured by traffic cameras are valid evidence against drivers who run red lights, in a victory for law enforcement over the use of the cameras that have often been met with public distrust....
docs.lead_paragraph: The California Supreme Court has ruled that images captured by traffic cameras are valid evidence against drivers who run red lights, in a victory for law enforcement over the use of the cameras that have often been met with public distrust.

headline.print_headline: L.A. Mayor Urges Less Emphasis on Criminal Records in Hiring, Housing
headline.main: L.A. Mayor Urges Less Emphasis on Criminal Records in Hiring, Housing

docs.snippet: The mayor of Los Angeles voiced support on Friday for a new state law barring public agencies from refusing job applications from people convicted of a crime and is pushing city leaders to broaden the measure to private-sector jobs and housing....
docs.lead_paragraph: The mayor of Los Angeles voiced support on Friday for a new state law barring public agencies from refusing job applications from people convicted of a crime and is pushing city leaders to broaden the measure to private-sector jobs and housing.

headline.print_headline: Family: Wisconsin Stabbing Victim Out of Hospital
headline.main: Family: Wisconsin Stabbing Victim Out of Hospital

docs.snippet: A 12-year-old Wisconsin girl who police say was repeatedly stabbed by two classmates trying to curry favor with a fictional horror character has been released from the hospital, the victim's parents said Friday night....
docs.lead_paragraph: A 12-year-old Wisconsin girl who police say was repeatedly stabbed by two classmates trying to curry favor with a fictional horror character has been released from the hospital, the victim's parents said Friday night.

headline.main: Hot Spots: All in the Family

docs.snippet: Politicians run ads heavily featuring family members to soften their image and present a positive front. Plus, who will run an ad denouncing a politician’s young child?...
docs.lead_paragraph: Politicians run ads heavily featuring family members to soften their image and present a positive front. Plus, who will run an ad denouncing a politician’s young child?
